import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; const Dashboard = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { user, logout } = useAuth(); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); toast.success('Logged out successfully'); navigate('/'); }; return (
{/* Header */}

CodeSync

Welcome, {user?.username}
{/* Main Content */}

Choose Your Workspace

Select how you want to start coding today

{/* File Management Workspace */}
📁

File Workspace

Create, edit, and manage files with auto-save functionality. Perfect for working on multiple files and projects.

  • ✅ File explorer with CRUD operations
  • ✅ Monaco Editor with syntax highlighting
  • ✅ Auto-save every 5 seconds
  • ✅ Language detection from file extensions
  • ✅ File sharing capabilities
{/* Collaborative Editor */}
👥

Collaborative Editor

Real-time collaborative coding with live synchronization. Perfect for pair programming and team collaboration.

  • ✅ Real-time collaboration
  • ✅ Live cursor tracking
  • ✅ Instant code synchronization
  • ✅ User presence indicators
  • ✅ Shared editing session
{/* Recent Activity */}

Getting Started

🚀

1. Choose Your Mode

Select between file management or collaborative editing based on your needs

📝

2. Start Coding

Create new files or join collaborative sessions to begin coding

💾

3. Auto-Save

Your work is automatically saved, so you never lose progress

); }; export default Dashboard;
